name: 1 Hour Circle Game... Thing
description:
A VERY simple Breakout type game, but without the blocks. 
You have to bounce the ball off the racket to gain score.
You lose a life if the your circle projectile hits the bottom.
When you lose all of your lives & have no currently active circle, you lose the game.

Controls:

The Mouse moves the racket

Left Mouse Button:  Shoot (The racket will shoot a ball automatically after 5 seconds)

Enter:  Restart(Only after defeat)

Esc: Quit
